version_description:
• Added iPad Landscape view
• Performance Enhancements

• Added iPad Landscape view
• Performance Enhancements

• Optimized content loading.
• Improved layout to better accomodate larger screen sizes.
• Added a scroll bar to the navigation view to better indicate the current location in the menu.
• Content recommendations based on the current article now show up at the bottom of articles.

• Optimized content loading.
• Improved layout to better accomodate larger screen sizes.
• Added a scroll bar to the navigation view to better indicate the current location in the menu.
• Content recommendations based on the current article now show up at the bottom of articles.

This release includes bug fixes, and optimizations.
• Fix for push notification opening a previous article.
• Adjusted push notification system to more often open pushes inside of the app.
• Updated Images to be completetly displayed.
